#summary How to install Jerboa

= Exteen =
== Step 1 ==
Download [http://jerboa-editor.googlecode.com/files/jerboa_for_exteen.user.js jerboa_for_exteen.user.js]

== Step 2 ==
Install *jerboa_for_exteen.user.js* in your [http://userscripts.org/about/installing GreaseMonkey]

== Step 3 ==
Login and Click *Enable Jerboa* 

And Enjoy :)
